etymologies: mid 19th century (in the sense ‘device that squirts liquid’): from German spritzen ‘to squirt’

definitions: squirt or spray something at or onto (something) in quick, short bursts

examples.text: she spritzed her neck with cologne

shortDefinitions: squirt or spray liquid at or on to something in quick, short bursts

definitions: spray (a liquid) in quick, short bursts

examples.text: she spritzed some perfume behind her ears

shortDefinitions: spray liquid in quick, short bursts

definitions: an act or an instance of squirting or spraying in quick short bursts.
shortDefinitions: act of squirting or spraying liquid in short bursts
